review_data.title: Lip Smacking Good Food
review_data.content: Only go their for the food. My favorite is the Dosa with the lamb and chutney. I go here very often and 99% of the times the food is delicious. Dont go for the ambience or service, etc.. Just plain "food"

review_data.title: Great place
review_data.content: Great food, friendly service. Good prices and must try their Cuttu Roti. Authentic Sri Lankan food. Dosa and snacks are made fresh. Amazing.

review_data.title: Horrible service
review_data.content: My family and I’ve decided to visit friends corner to get some Masala Dosa, we have never been treated this badly ever before in a restaurant. The staff didn’t pay attention at first then said something really rude (whispering) because we changed the table, since...More

review_data.title: Authentisch!!
review_data.content: Sehr leckeres Essen. Waren zu viert hier. Schneller Service. Freundliche Bedieung. Auf jeden Fall einen Besuch wert.

review_data.title: Einfach genial !!!!

review_data.title: Little Jaffna in Zurich
review_data.content: This is a Tamil restaurant run by Tamils from Jaffna. It is in an area that is fast becoming Little Jaffna in Zurich no doubt due to the influx of refugees from there in the past many years. It seems busy mainly with immigrants. Unfortunately...More

review_data.title: Good food
review_data.content: Found this place accidentally while having a walk and it's a good place to have typical south indian or Sri Lankan food! Food is hot spicy and to a typical South asian taste. Definitely will visit again when in Zurich.

review_data.title: May make you ill
review_data.content: Food tasted ok , but 15 minutes after leaving me an my partner were violently ill. Never ever happened to us before.

review_data.title: Keep coming back

review_data.title: Good kottu roti
review_data.content: The food is nice & portions are big, especially the kottu roti. The curry is fine but it comes with wery few rice. Minus points for the service and the ambience.

review_data.title: Excellent
review_data.content: Authentic Sri Lankan food. We’ve eaten here many times. The portions are generous and the prices are very reasonable. Whatever you choose to eat you can’t go wrong. All dishes are delicious and the service is quick and friendly. Highly recommended
